video_title: Steal My Framework For Going Viral On Twitter

content_profile.title: Steal My Framework For Going Viral On Twitter

key_takeaways: Solution: 5-step framework: Idea Lists, Gardening, Timing, Scroll Stoppers, Validating (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Create scroll-stopping 'insight bombs' that are controversial to some, exciting to others (Channel: content)
Growth Tactic: Content validation ladder from one-liner to full business (Channel: viral)
AI Workflow: Content editing and refinement
Strategy: Content ladder strategy - start with one-liner, expand to thread, then newsletter, blog, video, podc

startup_ideas.title: AI productivity learning community
startup_ideas.target_market: Professionals wanting to boost productivity with AI
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Learning how to effectively use AI for productivity
startup_ideas.validation: Tested as tweet first, then expanded

trend_opportunities.title: AI for productivity enhancement
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Educational communities and content around AI productivity tools

comment_derived_trends.trend: High interest in actionable, simple frameworks over complex strategies
supporting_comments: Great tips Greg. Love the simplicity.
Maybe it's been said before, but when you say it, I stop and start ... doing it.
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Market prefers clear, implementable advice over theoretical content
